ygData.subject: Re: Lambent in the younger years (was MM raid)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Gee Pava, hear I thought Moonflower Bllue answered all your in game questions !! You got other girl friends on the side ? No credit here ? Seriously, While
ygData.messageBody:
> Special thanks go to Athren Notechaser for the questions he answered for me
> before I went into the temple. You rock bro!
>
> Pava, Bard of 19th measure
> <Silent Dragons>
> Cazic Thule

Gee Pava, hear I thought Moonflower Bllue answered all your in game
questions !! You got other girl friends on the side ? No credit here ?

Seriously, While I am not in favor of a Bards only Guild for a number
of previously discussed reasons. I think as we get to higher levels we
would benefit from some form of loose, grouping association. I read an
appeal to sever specific Bards from Eci' here. We are lucky because we
have our own site at http://www.cazic-thule.com/ and when I just went
over there and did a search "in the past year" on topics in the "Bard
Class" forum I only found 10. I will start checking that forum on a
regular basis. I would love to know who has been good to bards and who
to avoid, Over the back fence gossip too <snicker> <giggle>.

Sineras Silverlyre, The Divine Alliance (Cazic-Thule)
Fflewduer
Chinchih

Hope to see you guys posting there too.

Moonflower Bllue, 32nd Bard
Cazic-thule
